document_data.name: Song of Compulsion
document_data.mainbody: '''''Song of compulsion''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[enchantment]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Milil]], enabling them to prevent the actions of others.
document_data.Effects: The caster began singing a popular traveling song with many verses. Anyone within a {{SI|60|ft}} cube centered where the caster selected who heard the song would be prevented from performing any actions or leaving the area until the song finished. Affected targets would defend themselves if attacked, but would not initiate combat or go on the offensive.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component]]s to cast.
